name: deploy-orders

on:
  push:
    branches:
      - master
    paths:
      - "services/orders/**"
    
jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v2

      - run: cd services/orders && docker build -t cowculator99/ticketing-orders .
      - run: docker login -u $DOCKER_USERNAME -p $DOCKER_PASSWORD
        env:
          DOCKER_USERNAME: ${{ secrets.DOCKER_USERNAME }}
          DOCKER_PASSWORD: ${{ secrets.DOCKER_PASSWORD }}
      - run: docker push cowculator99/ticketing-orders

      - uses: digitalocean/action-doctl@v2
        with:
          token: ${{ secrets.DIGITALOCEAN_ACCESS_TOKEN }}
      - run: doctl kubernetes cluster kubeconfig save ticketing-k8s # connects to the cloud provider k8s context
      - run: kubectl rollout restart deployment orders-depl
